description: A schema for simple jobs, i.e. those that get uploaded in jobSets, typically to a public job board. Removes nuances such as status, internal candidates, etc.

title.description: A short phrase describing the position as it would be listed on a business card or in a company directory

shortSummary.description: A short (up to 75 characters) and enticing call to action for candidates for this job

description.description: The job's description. Job descriptions are formatted using the safe subset of markdown (see documentation for GET /jobs/{}/description)

viewUri.description: URI to view the opening - see HR-XML

applyUri.description: URI of the page where a candidate applies - see HR-XML

closeDate.description: the date on which applications are scheduled to close

datePosted.description: the date on which the job was advertised/posted - downstream job boards may use or ignore

links.description: an array of links to resources (videos etc.) that are relevant to the job
